attributes.action: Sign this Petition, The Pro E.U. Leaflet is a total misuse of taxpayers money.
attributes.additional_details: Bring Legal Proceedings against the Government for not following Electoral Commission rules.
attributes.background: Every Government or Local Authority information leaflet , has to By Electoral Commission Rules set in stone by The British Parliament name both the Promotor of the Leaflet & the Printing Company, apparently the Government leaflet was printed by A German Company.

rejection.details:
If you wish to make a complaint to the Electoral Commission, you can do so by writing to:
The Electoral Commission
3 Bunhill Row
London
EC1Y 8YZ

Or via email to:
pef@electoralcommission.org.uk
